memories.summary: On January 20, 2025, in Ann Arbor, Maya painted in her small studio, brushes scattered around as sunlight fell across the canvas.
On February 14, 2025, in New York, Maya visited a modern art museum with her friend Julia, pausing in front of a large installation.
On March 11, 2025, in Paris, Maya posed by the Eiffel Tower with her brother Leo during a spring trip.
On April 25, 2025, in Rome, Maya sketched at an outdoor caf√© table, holding a notebook with the Colosseum in view.
On May 30, 2025, in Madrid, Maya visited a local market with Julia, buying fruit while street musicians played nearby.
On June 18, 2025, in London, Maya attended a gallery opening with friends, holding a glass of wine in a crowded room.
On July 24, 2025, in Berlin, Maya painted a mural with a local art collective, bright colors spreading across a wall.
On September 8, 2025, in Tokyo, Maya joined a pottery class, shaping clay alongside Japanese artisans.
On October 29, 2025, in Sydney, Maya visited the Opera House with Leo, taking a photo on the harbor steps.
On December 31, 2025, in Barcelona, Maya celebrated New Year's Eve at a plaza, surrounded by fireworks and cheering crowds.

qa_pairs.question: Which forms of art did Maya practice during her travels?
qa_pairs.answer_gold: Painting in Ann Arbor and Berlin, sketching in Rome, and pottery in Tokyo.

qa_pairs.question: Which trips abroad did Maya take with family versus friends?
qa_pairs.answer_gold: With her brother Leo in Paris and Sydney, with Julia in Madrid and Barcelona, and with Rachel and Omar in London.

qa_pairs.question: Which memories show Maya connecting with local culture?
qa_pairs.answer_gold: Shopping at a Madrid market, painting a mural in Berlin, and shaping clay in a Tokyo pottery class.

qa_pairs.question: Which memory best reflects celebration, and what details highlight it?
qa_pairs.answer_gold: New Year's Eve in Barcelona, surrounded by fireworks and cheering crowds.

qa_pairs.question: Which continents did Maya visit in 2025?
qa_pairs.answer_gold: Europe (France, Italy, Spain, UK, Germany), Asia (Japan), and Australia (Sydney).
